basics.name: Rudi Middel
basics.label: Business Technology Analyst
basics.summary: Curious, having fun and enjoying life are my core values. Whether it concerns my personal or my professional life. As a father, I see the joy in my children every dag. In my work the joy translates to working hard and completing my projects. It does not matter if this is to solve complex issues, creating a report or starting something new and unknown. I will perform the tasks with undivided attention and dedication. Leaving no moment untouched to celebrate. As a Burgundian I know how to appreciate good food and company.

work.summary: As part of multiple SCRUM teams analysing the requirements as defined by the PO. Making sure that the requirements are clear for the development team and ready for refinement. Also making sure that the requirement is the 'real' question that is asked by the PO.
highlights: Improving the Sanoma Learning Content Chain
Creating the Content Chain Printing solution

work.summary: As part of multiple scrum teams analysing the requirements as defined by the PO. Making sure that the requirements are clear for the development team and ready for refinement. Also making sure that the requirement is the 'real' question that is asked by the PO.
highlights: Starting up the Malmberg Content Chain Requirement process
Untangling multiple data flows en creating structure in the data
Separating presentation from the input of content

work.summary: Further enhance the development of software hosted by SkillSource.nl. This includes the redesign of the tools, further update internal processes and bring the software development to a higher level.

Investigate processes, gathering requirements and leading project are the key features of my job. Maintaining a good and healthy relationship with the process/business owner on request management while working together with the Application Developers or IT specialists capability (mainly based in Toulouse, France), can be a challenge. Especially in a complex project like CDM@AMS where multiple companies and stakeholders work together.
highlights: Implementation & maintaining Milord Sirocco for KLM

work.summary: Investigate processes, gathering requirements and leading projects are the key features of my job. Maintaining a good and healthy relationship with the process/business owner on request management while working together with the Application Developers or IT specialists capability, can be a challenge. Mainly because they have different wishes and expectations. The biggest and most rewarding project I was involved in, was the development and standardization of the processes in our department Information Management. This transformation of an ad-hoc organization to a more structured and solid department is a change Iâ€™m glad to have been part of.
Developing and maintaining software to support the business. Continuity and operational performance are the keywords during every day work.
highlights: Development of a new planning system for ground services

work.summary: Developing and maintaining software to support the business. Continuity and operational performance are the keywords during every day work.

As a software developer I had small internal assignments. I also supported colleagues who needed help. This could be with technical questions as well as to brainstorm when stuck on an assignment for a customer. My final assignment was with KLM Cityhopper.
As a part-time job during college I created a system called Raadsleden Informatie Systeem. I also had a major part in the creation of the Document Kwaliteit Systeem and a web portal.

volunteer.organization: Vriendenkring Ge Wit 'T Oit Noit Nie
volunteer.summary: Since 2015 I've been chairman of Ge Wit 't Oit Noit Nie. This organisation creates a rolling theater each year in August as part of an event called Brabantsedag.

education.summary: Learn the basics of gamification and engagement science, and how this powerful new design trend will affect your business from a practical, non-academic perspective.
I attended Higher Informatics at the Fontys University of Applied Science. This study focusses on software development and project management.

A basic education program focused on the use of Software Design, Network Control and Software itself (i.e. AutoCAD). There is also a curriculum based on electronics. During this program I worked on a project called The BitSim. This 8051 micro-controller that can be used in the classroom to train on Embedded Software design. I was responsible for creating a Basic parser.

interests.name: Photography
interests.summary: Capture as many moments as you can. Memory will fade, pictures remain.

references.name: Bram Bregman
references.reference: I know Rudi as enthusiastic, flexible, driven and eager to learn. He has relevant expertise in the airline operations domain and he possesses a profound and broad knowledge of IT. Four years ago, I got acquainted with Rudi when he was a professional senior application developer. Nowadays, Rudi shows an equal high level of professionalism in his role as business analyst. This combination of experiences makes Rudi a valuable sparring-partner for both business as well as IT.

references.name: Mirjam Bonnema
references.reference: Working with Rudi has been enjoyable since he is always willing to help and he approaches things with a positive and professional mind.
